nodes.text: The Ren was the name given to a red-bladed lightsaber wielded by Ren, the leader of the Knights of Ren. Ren believed in an ideology based on the lightsaber, in which the Ren was simply "its nature, and nothing else," and that the Ren had no remorse and was not concerned with right or wrong or the goals it might achieve. Because of this ideology, the Knights of Ren followed a flexible code, living life the way they wanted, taking what the galaxy gave them, and consuming what the dark side sent them without any further thought or consideration.
Ren used the lightsaber when fighting Jedi Master Luke Skywalker, his apprentice, Ben Solo, and Lor San Tekka.
